citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:00 on
02-Jul-18.
Arrived at facility to find no responsible adult available to conduct the inspection. Contacted owner via phone and
learned no one would be available for at least 3 hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:00 on
02-Jul-18.
Arrived at facility to find no responsible adult available to conduct the inspection.  Contacted owner via phone and
learned no one would be available for at least 3 hours.
